page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our sector is in a beautiful area of the country-very hilly and with striking scenery.It is in the Yorkshire Dales National Park.It is principally rural and contains only 2 villages-Kirkby Malham and Airton,2 hamlets-Hanlith and Calton,and a few outlying farms. The block itself is not very tourist orientated,although to get to Malham,a popular tourist resort,one must pass through it. The community is very insular,and any events,such as coffee mornings,tend to be attended by people from throughout Malhamdale.It is also very traditional and dislikes change of any kind. {NOTE:}Although called Malhamdale,this block does not actually contain Malham itself.
